summary: A dramedy about relationships and fidelity, or the lack thereof. A group of old high school friends, now in their late thirties, get together for the weekend to celebrate the 4th of July, for better or for worse.
cast: Ed Quinn|Meredith Monroe|Gale Harold|Lauren Stamile|Elaine Hendrix|Mark Kelly|Charley Mae Caland|Ross Partridge|Cynthia Enriquez|Tom Bower|Aladdin Zane|Molly Cheek|Don McManus|Peyton List|Lina Esco|Devon Gummersall|Sebastian Sainz|Adam William Ward|Lauren Byrnes
title: Low Fidelity
